dcterms:creator: Silvio Amir
Mark Dredze
John W. Ayers
dcterms:description: A digital cohort of US-based Twitter users constructed to measure the prevalence of depression and PTSD, characterized by demographic attributes such as age, gender, location, and race/ethnicity.
dcterms:title: Twitter Cohort

dcterms:creator: Glen A. Coppersmith
Mark Dredze
Craig Harman
Kristy Hollingshead
Margaret Mitchell
dcterms:description: A dataset of self-reported diagnoses of depression and PTSD from Twitter users, used for training mental health classifiers.
dcterms:title: CLPsych 2015
